thread.title: Zahra Temeemi
thread.title_full: Euroflorist Sverige recenserad av Zahra Temeemi

author: Zahra Temeemi
title: Zahra Temeemi
text:
I am very happy with your service. I live in Dubai while my friend lives in Sweden.
I changed the delivery address right after my order and the EuroFlorist team was kind enough to reply quickly. Delivery took place on the same day exactly as promised. The staff who delivered called the recipient but never told him that I was the one who sent the flowers so that the surprise is not ruined. Flowers were also very close to the picture.!
This was my first experience with EuroFlorist and guys, you are awesome!
Keep up the hardwork.
